name: Cornbit
description: Cornbit is the first startup to build a bridge between the trillion dollar market and web3, bringing shoppers and businesses together in a decentralized economy. Cornbit Plaza is our vision of a Classified Platform. It is customizable for any niche, geography, language, and different monetization methods without programming knowledge. Suitable for both niche and large projects. Easily transformed into a marketplace. Cornbit Marketplace Platform is a ready-to-launch, professional B2C or B2B marketplace â€“ easy to set up, maintain and develop for any niche, geography, language and different methods of monetization. Suitable from startup to large scale.
